model

Class MapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MapModel

  • public class MapModel
extends java.lang.Object

    The Class MapModel provides basic methods of the Model component.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Groupe 13

                                 int positionX,
                                 int positionY)
        Choose the good class for the elements (from type given in ElementsList)
        Parameters:
        type - type of the future element
        stringStyle - each stringStyle corresponds to a specific sprite (example "L1" = the player)
        positionX - X coordinate
        positionY - Y coordinate
